It's the Browser...

Tuesday Nov 08, 2011
The Web OS is already here… it’s just not what you thought it would be. Web technologies are currently powering content and interactions across multiple devices effectively turning the most popular native applications into Web browsers. The end result is a widely distributed and used Web-based operating system. Just not the one you imagined. Link to the rest: www.lukew.com
